description: Take a break from reality and enter an exclusively adults-only Fijian paradise at Namale Resort & Spa. This all-inclusive tropical haven will provide you with celebrity-grade service from the moment you set foot in this secluded nirvana. Experience six nights of unparalleled luxury with all decadent meals, unique dining experiences, unlimited alcoholic (and non-alcoholic) drinks, two blissful spa treatments to share and private return airport transfers included.
offer_address: 1 Hibiscus Hwy Savusavu, Vanua Levu, Fiji
